edu.sdsmt.WornerTillma.App2

Class ViewListFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListFragment
      • edu.sdsmt.WornerTillma.App2.ViewListFragment

  • public class ViewListFragment
extends ListFragment
    The fragment which shows lists contacts.

    Description:
    This class is the list fragment. It is the main page of the app and lists all the user's contacts.

    Since:
    October 22, 2013
    Author:
    James Tillma and Teresa Worner
